content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the ESL Languages website and find out which language courses interest the user. Your computer executed the command to browse the website and returned a list of language courses offered by ESL Languages, including English, French, German, Spanish, Japanese, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Arabic, Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Thai, Greek, and Turkish. The website also provided links to the main content, course finder, price request, and brochure.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: EF offers courses in 10 languages and 50 destinations, with options for language and academic studies abroad, as well as personalized language courses for adults and professionals. \n \n Links: ['Menu (https://www.ef.com/wwen/pg/language-travel/)', ' (https://www.ef.com/wwen/)', 'FR (https://www.ef.com/wwfr/pg/sejour-linguistique/)', 'ES (https://www.ef.com/wwes/pg/viajes-idiomas/)', 'AR (https://www.ef.com/wwar/pg/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.cactuslanguage.com/", "question": "What language courses does Cactus Language offer?"}}}'}]
"""
